alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:44AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cass and eastern Barnes Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 744 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tower City, or 15 miles east of Valley City, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Tower City around 745 AM CDT. Buffalo around 750 AM CDT. Ayr around 755 AM CDT. Absaraka and Wheatland around 800 AM CDT. Amenia and Casselton around 810 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Casselton Airport. This includes Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 304 and 338. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for southeastern North Dakota.
